channel.title: The Townhouse Podcast
channel.googleplay:author: The Townhouse Podcast
channel.description: A fun hobby of several close friends hoping to share some laughs with each other and anyone else who might be interested.

item.title: Episode 3: Revenge of the Bad Titles
item.description: Xavier, Gavin, and Anthony meet once again for the 3rd episode of the Townhouse Podcast. They are joined by a very special guest DAN as they discuss movies, video games, beer, and their hopes and dreams for the Star Wars Franchise.

item.title: Episode 2: Is a four year degree "worth it"?
item.description: Xavier, Gavin, Anthony reminice about childhood and discuss the alternatives to college, but not before exploring some questionable news stories about Canadians, cocaine, and Uranus.

item.title: Episode 1: "Go easy on me, it's my first time"
item.description: Xavier, Gavin, and Anthony, tell their origin story and discuss news, Assassins Creed, beer, and selfishness in their comically mediocre pilot episode to the Townhouse Podcast.
